languages.text: "Благодарю тебя за путь, что мы прошли". {n}Паскаль склоняется в поклоне, и кажется, что его худые плечи опускаются целую вечность с тех высот, на которые воспарил его разум.{/n} "И сожалею о том, что случилось с Теодорой".

"Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю тебя за путь, что мы прошли". {n}Паскаль склоняется в поклоне, и кажется, что его худые плечи опускаются целую вечность с тех высот, на которые воспарил его разум.{/n} "И сожалею о том, что случилось с Теодорой".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「共に歩んでくれたこと、感謝する」{n}パスカルが頭を下げるにつれ、細い肩がその知性が飛躍した高みからどこまでも落ちていくようだ。{/n}「またシオドーラの件は気の毒だった」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."

traits.locale_text: 「共に歩んでくれたこと、感謝する」{n}パスカルが頭を下げるにつれ、細い肩がその知性が飛躍した高みからどこまでも落ちていくようだ。{/n}「またシオドーラの件は気の毒だった」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “谢谢你与我们同行的这段旅程。”{n}帕斯卡缓缓鞠躬，他那瘦削的肩膀似乎要花上一段时间，才能从他思想所翱翔的高度降下来。{/n}“我对西奥多拉的事情感到遗憾。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你与我们同行的这段旅程。”{n}帕斯卡缓缓鞠躬，他那瘦削的肩膀似乎要花上一段时间，才能从他思想所翱翔的高度降下来。{/n}“我对西奥多拉的事情感到遗憾。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous remercie de m'avoir gardé à vos côtés. » {n}Alors que Pasqal s'incline, ses épaules semblent prendre une éternité à descendre des hauteurs que sillonne son esprit.{/n} « Et je suis désolé pour ce qui est arrivé à Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie de m'avoir gardé à vos côtés. » {n}Alors que Pasqal s'incline, ses épaules semblent prendre une éternité à descendre des hauteurs que sillonne son esprit.{/n} « Et je suis désolé pour ce qui est arrivé à Théodora. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por el camino que hemos recorrido». {n}A medida que Pasqal se inclina, parece que a sus delgados hombros les lleve una eternidad descender desde las alturas a las que su mente se ha elevado.{/n} «Y siento lo que le ocurrió a Theodora».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por el camino que hemos recorrido». {n}A medida que Pasqal se inclina, parece que a sus delgados hombros les lleve una eternidad descender desde las alturas a las que su mente se ha elevado.{/n} «Y siento lo que le ocurrió a Theodora».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für den Pfad, auf dem wir gewandelt sind." {n}Als Pasqal sich verneigt, scheinen seine dünnen Schultern eine Ewigkeit zu brauchen, um aus den Höhen herabzusteigen, in die sein Verstand aufgestiegen ist.{/n} "Und es tut mir leid, was mit Theodora geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für den Pfad, auf dem wir gewandelt sind." {n}Als Pasqal sich verneigt, scheinen seine dünnen Schultern eine Ewigkeit zu brauchen, um aus den Höhen herabzusteigen, in die sein Verstand aufgestiegen ist.{/n} "Und es tut mir leid, was mit Theodora geschehen ist."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Birlikte yürüdüğümüz yol için sana teşekkür ediyorum." {n}Pasqal başını eğiyor. İnce omuzlarının, zihninin ulaştığı o yüce boyuttan inmesi bayağı bir zaman alıyor.{/n} "Theodora'ya olanlar için de üzgünüm."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the path we have walked." {n}As Pasqal bows, his thin shoulders seem to take an eternity to descend from the heights that his mind has soared to.{/n} "And I am sorry about what happened to Theodora."

traits.locale_text: "Birlikte yürüdüğümüz yol için sana teşekkür ediyorum." {n}Pasqal başını eğiyor. İnce omuzlarının, zihninin ulaştığı yükseltilerden aşağı inmesi çok uzun sürüyor gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Theodora'ya olanlar için üzgünüm."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
